contents:
I do judge people a lot, but very rarely do I make mistakes. In the case of the user Mephisto, he really needs a doctor...I don't know the actual reason for my INSPECTING status.

If you are concerned about someone's health, maybe try expressing your concern in a more socially-acceptable way? Please, please, try not to use phrases like "must die." It can be very, very hurtful, and it goes against social protocols, as it can be taken as malicious cursing.

I never accuse people of anything they didn't do (bottom line)...I'm more of a point-out-the-obvious kind of person.

That's my impression of what you've been trying to do too.
